title: Crash during full sync

labels.name: TeamChupa
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Chupacabara Team

body:
**Actual behavior:** [What actually happens]
Besu crashed while doing full sync on a newer block `7342831` on Goerli.  it was running normally and synced. several other Besu nodes and all geth nodes are fine but this now is out of sync and looping. the node has 1 restart.

* Software version: [`22.7.0-snapshot`]

**Stack trace:**

snapshot releases are a moving target, can we reproduce this with a specific release version or share the commit hash that the snapshot was built from? 🙏
